summary: This document is a series of pages from a MetroPCS phone call detail record, spanning from January 1, 2006, to August 1, 2006. It logs numerous phone calls with timestamps, dialed numbers, and call durations, likely part of a financial or investigative record related to the Epstein case. This document is a series of call detail records from MetroPCS, spanning pages 112-125 and page 1 of another set, covering dates from February to August 2006. It logs phone call times, durations, and caller IDs, appearing to be evidence or a record of communications for investigative purposes. No specific individuals are named in the provided text. This document is a call detail record from MetroPCS, listing hundreds of phone calls made and received over a period from February 9, 2006, to February 24, 2006. It includes timestamps, call durations, and technical direction codes, but no named individuals or substantive content about conversations. This document is a segment of a MetroPCS call detail record, spanning pages 19-33 of a 179-page file. It logs hundreds of phone calls from February 24, 2006, to March 12, 2006, showing timestamps, dialed numbers, call direction, and duration. It appears to be a forensic record of phone activity, likely subpoenaed for investigation. This document is a series of pages from a MetroPCS call detail record, spanning from January 1, 2006, to July 19, 2006. It shows detailed logs of phone calls made and received, including timestamps, durations, and technical call data. The specific pages provided (34-47) cover call activity from March 12-22, 2006. This document is a segment of call detail records from a MetroPCS phone, covering pages 48-61 of a 179-page log spanning January 1, 2006, to July 19, 2006. It shows detailed call timestamps, durations, and caller ID numbers for a specific period in March and April 2006. The records are part of investigative evidence, likely documenting communication patterns. This document is a series of pages from a MetroPCS call detail record, spanning from January 1, 2006, to July 19, 2006. It logs numerous phone calls with timestamps, dialed numbers, durations, and direction indicators (e.g., ML, LM, MM). The data appears to be part of a larger investigative file, likely documenting communication patterns for a specific phone number during this period.
